Turtle esports Technologies (ESL Gaming) | Cologne, Germany | Onsite, Full Time | Devops Engineer

ESL are one of the biggest names in esports and have been hosting events intentionally for over 10 years. You'll work in an experienced team improving our infrastructure and support our development team who produce a number of pieces from anti-cheat to tournament systems. Currently shifting focus towards a fully automated stack using standard industry tools.

Juniors and seniors welcome to apply. Jobs listing:

http://www.turtle-entertainment.com/career/

Additional postings also there, from Event management to Television.
